title: 006 - Bob Smiley, Part 2 - Pickles, Deer Urine, and Decorative Towels
description:
In part two, Tim and Bob delve into why B's are funnier than R's, how to field dress a deer, and the Wiggle's Greatest Hits. Bob also talks about his recent divorce, his new role as a single parent, and reading the fine print for online dating profiles. Caleb and Jackson, Tim's youngest son, are along for the ride.  See more of Bob at: http://www.bobsmiley.com
 Bob's twitter: @bobsmileycomic
 Also, send your questions, comments, and conspiracy theories to our new Poddy Break twitter account: @poddybreak
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: We always sit knee to knee...
